data.title: Strata Identity on LinkedIn: How Strata Identity and Microsoft Entra ID solve identity challenges in‚Ä¶
data.meta_description: Is a merger, acquisition, or divestiture (M&A) in the plans for your organization in 2024? Strata Identity's CTO and Co-founder, Topher Marie, shares how using‚Ä¶
data.text:
#BlackHat2024 is in 15 days!! üóìÔ∏è Who else is excited to geek out over the latest hacks, sip overpriced cocktailsüç∏ and pretend we understand quantum computing? Pro tip: Start practicing your "I totally get it" nod now. Bonus pro tip: if you're an architect, CISO, or other #IAM leader, schedule time to grab coffee with our Strata Identity team Aug 6-8th and get a free travel organizer ($60 value!): https://lnkd.in/gVsB-beK #Maverics #IdentityOrchestration

Timing is everything. Rudy Sutjiato is the newest Maveric, and his joining Strata Identity has been two years in the making! The üåü stars finally aligned this time, and we couldn't be happier. Rudy brings over 20 years of experience working in various roles in the IAM space. That's some serious street cred. When asked why he joined Strata, Rudy replied: "After talking to a few team members from Strata, I know this is the company I want to join." Rudy is also an international man of mystery!: "I have experience living and working in four countries now (Indonesia, Singapore, Canada, and the USA). I also speak and understand five languages," said Rudy. Welcome to the wave, Rudy! We're so glad you've chosen to ride with us.üåä

üëã Meet the Strata Identity crew rolling into Black Hat! Eric Olden, Matt Teeple, and Granville Schmidt, CISSP, CCSP, HCISPP, CIPT. We're on a mission to make IAM fun and rewarding for you. (Yes, it's possible!) Come chat with us about our newest orchestration possibilities, like keeping your apps available even when your IDP is not. Or just come for the free coffee and Strata cool merch. We won't judge. Book a meeting: https://bit.ly/3LjbBqW üìç 3940 Coffee & Tea House (Las Vegas Blvd S Delano) üìÖ August 6-8, 2024 Let's make #BH2024 epic ‚Äî together. #BlackHat2024 #IdentityHeroes #IdentityOrchestration

Strata Identity was represented well by Delonte Wellington at the recent üçë Atlanta CSA meeting. The region's top cyber and cloud security leaders gathered to network, learn, and enjoy good food (and even better company)! Ed Pascua C-CISO, CISSP Pascua of Cloud Security Alliance ATL, thanks for bringing everyone together for this excellent event. It was a pleasure to be a sponsor! #CSA #Atlanta #IdentityOrchestration

Strata Identity has been named a finalist in the Timmy Awards by Tech in Motion! üèÜ You can help us win by voting here: https://bit.ly/3S9IKcr This award recognizes outstanding startups that are built by forward-thinking leaders with a product or service that aims to disrupt the market. A 2024 Best Tech Startup exemplifies agility, innovation, and resilience, as well as an ability to foster an outstanding work environment for its employees. Congratulations to the other finalists! Stay tuned; winners will be announced soon ü§û #TimmyAwards #TechInMotion #Maverics

Welcome to Alex Stilian, our newest Maveric! Alex joins Strata Identity as a Sales Engineer for our go-to-market team. He brings the years of experience he has honed at companies like Oracle and Aspire Systems. When asked why he joined Strata Identity, he shared this: "I noticed the love for technology, but most importantly, the love for innovation," said Alex. "Strata is pioneering a new way for companies to manage security/risk while building solutions organically. Additionally, every individual I spoke with seemed like-minded: curious, collaborative, and full of purpose. I knew I needed to be here." We're excited to see his stellar skill of making technology easy to understand while also providing an in-depth view to technical people. So glad you're on the wave with us, Alex Stilian! üåä

üéí Attention, Black Hat Identity Heroes! We're giving away 15 travel organizer gifts to help you conquer the con like a pro. How to win it? Work at an enterprise with over 1K people and book a meeting with our on-site team here: https://lnkd.in/gf2VcK4P May the odds be ever in your favor. #BH2024 #identityhero

We're thrilled to announce that Aldo Pietropaolo has joined Strata Identity as our Field CTO. Aldo has over 20 years of experience in the identity industry as an executive, advisor, and solutions engineering leader. In his new role, Aldo Pietropaolo will serve as the technical liaison, working closely with customers and the field team. He will provide expert guidance on implementing Strata‚Äôs Maverics platform to help organizations achieve their business goals, enhance security, and ensure regulatory compliance. Learn more in the Press Release: https://bit.ly/3zB8msu

M&As can be great for businesses ‚Äî but identity and employee access can get complicated, fast. If you don‚Äôt handle it right, it can lead to employees trying to log into two different laptops to get access to all the apps they need to get the job done‚Ä¶ ü§¶‚ôÄÔ∏è Skip that, by using #IdentityOrchestration! Watch this Orchestration Kitchen workshop to see how you can make IDP coexistence easy and enjoy a smooth transition. Watch now https://lnkd.in/gNCBRT6E #StrataIdentity #IAM #OrchestrationKitchen

ü•Ç Happy Strataversary to three of our magnificent Maverics! Gerry Gebel, Mark Callahan, and Cody Pritchard, you have each made an indelible mark here in your time at Strata Identity. We are so grateful for your contributions to building our products, supporting our customers, telling the story of Identity Orchestration, and helping to create the best team culture out there. We look forward to celebrating many more milestones with you!
